casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF: V.P.M.A. No. 368P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 30, 2019 Mark L. Hayes, Attorney at Law, for Mylenski, Tara Marie. Mary Boyce Wells, Senior Assistant County Attorney, Roger A. Askew, Senior Deputy County Attorney, for Wake County Human Services. Matthew Wunsche, Attorney at Law, Durham, for GAL.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 23rd of October 2018 by Respondent (Mother) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019."
